changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE ruleform.access_authorization ( id bigserial NOT NULL, product1 bigint, agency1 bigint, location1 bigint, authorization_type character varying NOT NULL, relationship bigint NOT NULL, product2 bigint, agency2 bigint, location2 bigint, parent_transitive_relationship bigint, child_transitive_relationship bigint, description character varying, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone,
CONSTRAINT access_authorization_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT access_authorization_product1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product1) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_agency1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (agency1) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_location1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location1) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_product2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product2) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_agency2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (agency2) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_location2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location2) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_parent_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (parent_transitive_relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_child_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (child_transitive_relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_one_parent CHECK (ruleform.null_zero(product1) + ruleform.null_zero(agency1) + ruleform.null_zero(location1) = 1), CONSTRAINT access_authorization_one_child CHECK (ruleform.null_zero(product2) + ruleform.null_zero(agency2) + ruleform.null_zero(location2) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.access_authorization IS 'Authorizations to join networks of ruleforms';
